newLines.text: Speaking of Kendrick's performance, did you know he and SZA have collaborated multiple times?
Yeah, their song 'All The Stars' from Black Panther was nominated for an Oscar and multiple Grammys.
They also worked together on 'Doves in the Wind' from SZA's album Ctrl back in 2017.
I heard SZA actually signed to Top Dawg Entertainment, Kendrick's label, before she got famous.

highLevelSummary: The Super Bowl halftime show featured an incredible performance by Kendrick Lamar, showcasing hits from his album 'Mr. Morale & the Big Steppers' along with classics like 'Alright' and 'HUMBLE.' The performance demonstrated his artistic evolution and stage presence, incorporating elaborate choreography and powerful social messaging.

currentTopic.title: Kendrick Lamar's Super Bowl Performance
currentTopic.description: Discussion of Kendrick Lamar's impactful halftime show performance at the Super Bowl, highlighting his song selection and artistic presentation.
